description: Indices of A052343 (ways to write n as sum of two triangular numbers) where record values are reached.
references: The College Mathematics Journal Vol. 30 No. 5, Nov. 1999 Problem 665.
crossrefs: Probably differs from A053587 only at n=1, 2, 4. Cf. A000217, A052343-A052347.
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jan 23 2000
